name: nativescript-app-shortcuts
description: Add shortcut actions to your app icon.

scripts.build: ns clean && npm i && npm run ts.patch && npm run tsc
scripts.demo.ios: npm run build && cd ../demo && ns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && ns run android
scripts.test: npm run tslint && npm run tslint.demo && cd ../demo && ns build ios && ns build android
scripts.test.ios: cd ../demo && ns platform remove ios && ns test ios --emulator
scripts.test.ios.device: cd ../demo && ns platform remove ios && ns test ios
scripts.test.android: cd ../demo && ns platform remove android && ns test android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd ../demo && ns clean && ns install
scripts.setup: npm run build && cd ../demo && npm i
scripts.setupandinstall: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run build && cd ../demo && ns plugin add ../src && cd ../src
scripts.development.setup: npm run setup && npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-app-shortcuts && cd ../src
